Reviews.Title: TV works great.
Reviews.Author: Jimmy Morelli
Reviews.Content: The TV has always worked great, Panasonic makes great products.  I bought mine in 2003 and still use it today, no problems so far.  I love this TV, great sound, great picture and great HD.  It looks nice and has all the channels to hook up the gadgets.  It is a great TV.  Unfortunately everything is going plasma or LCD or what ever.  I paid just over $2000 for mine, 6 years later and at the end of its run this should be priced well under a grand.  Its not that it is not worth it, its just that its time is up.  I would check out the newer generation TVs, that is the best way to go.  Check out Panasonic, all my Panasonic products have lasted long past their prime.

ProductInfo.Features:
Experience incredibly sharp picture quality, brilliant color and resonating sound

Impressive stereo sound and enhanced, vivid color quality
